title: Bagelgate Outrage & The Rise of Snowplow Parenting | Lupita Nyong'o
itunes:title: Bagelgate Outrage & The Rise of Snowplow Parenting | Lupita Nyong'o
description:
A bagel controversy explodes on social media, Trevor highlights the phenomenon of snowplow parenting, and actor Lupita Nyong'o discusses her dual role in "Us."
